description.value: You dash forward, unhindered by obstacles or walls. Stride and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Long Jump] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.High Jump] (in any order). You must start your movement on a horizontal surface. During this movement, you can ignore difficult terrain and run up vertical surfaces, like walls, at your full Speed. If you end the Stride off the ground, you fall after taking your next action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first (though you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Grab an Edge], if applicable).
